description: Increases all party members' DEF by 14% and max HP by 12%, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription:
Th tea is a favorite of Aalto. As the water in the pot turns to mist and then back into water in the cup, the aroma of the tea is coupled with the soothing mist. 
"Now, let's get down to business."
It seems Aalto's mastery of tea-making is just one of his many skills in the business world.
